lead_paragraph: , Reuters - Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone must watch his team’s remaining La Liga matches from the stands after being handed a three-game touchline ban for allowing a ball to be thrown onto the pitch during Atletico’s 1-0 win over Malaga on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Simeone to Miss Atletico Title Run After Touchline Ban
headline.main: Simeone to Miss Atletico Title Run After Touchline Ban
